articles.description: Punjab National Bank share is on cusp of giving breakout at  ₹97 and regain its pre-Covid levels, say experts
articles.content: Punjab National Bank (PNB) share price has been in uptrend since June 2023. After bottoming out at around 30 apiece levels on NSE, this PSU bank share has risen to the tune of 165 per cent in these 1… [+3207 chars]

articles.title: Is old warhorse Bajaj Finance stocking $1 billion ammunition to ward off threat from Ambanis? - The Economic Times
articles.description: While the finer details on Mukesh Ambani's gameplan in the financial services sector is yet to be made public, Jio Financial has plans to foray into consumer, merchant and MSME lending. Market reports suggest that the company has already started consumer lend…
articles.content: Bajaj Finance's fundraising plan has surprised analysts as India's most valued NBFC has reasonable consolidated leverage of 5.2x, and is well-capitalised with Tier-I capital of about 23% and RoE of 2… [+3580 chars]

articles.author: Shivendra Kumar
articles.title: F&O Ban: Canara Bank among 5 stocks under ban on Tuesday - The Economic Times
articles.description: The F&O contracts of any stock enter the ban period when the open interest (OI) on it crosses 95% of the market-wide positions limits or MWPL. The ban on it is reversed only if the open interest falls below 80%. Traders who trade in indices do not encounter a…
articles.content: Five stocks are under F&O trade ban on Tuesday, September 26, 2023, viz. Balrampur Chini, Canara Bank, Granules India, Hindustan Copper and Indiabulls Housing Finance Company.The F&O contract… [+1742 chars]
